text: Grand Power s.r.o. is a Slovak defence supplier specializing in the design and manufacturing of firearms and tactical components such as sound suppressors. The company is based in Banská Bystrica. The company exports almost 95% of its production. The remaining 5% are sold in Slovakia.https://grandpower.eu/company-profile/?lang=en Grand Power is the manufacturer of the K100 pistol, known by their rare rotating barrel locking system. The Grand Power STRIBOG is under evaluation by the US Army. ==See also== * Grand Power K100 ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Companies established in 2002 Category:Companies of Slovakia
title: Grand Power
